Class GUIFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUIFrame
  • public class GUIFrame
extends java.lang.Object
    Public class GUIFrame creates a new GUI for a Arabic to Roman and Roman to Arabic converter
    Author:
    nicreid

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      (package private) int[] Amount
      int array that holds integers compared to Roman numerals
      (package private) javax.swing.JTextField ArabicInput
      JTextField to hold Arabic input or Roman conversions
      (package private) javax.swing.JLabel arabicLabel
      JLabel declaring the Arabic side
      (package private) javax.swing.JPanel Converter
      JPanel that holds the contents of the GUI
      (package private) javax.swing.JFrame GUI
      Frame for holding the Converter
      (package private) char[] Roman
      character array with Roman Numerals
      (package private) int[] RomanButIntegers
      Integer array for all Roman combinations that are singular or subtract as arabic nubmers
      (package private) javax.swing.JTextField RomanInput
      JTextField to hold Roman input or Arabic conversions
      (package private) javax.swing.JLabel romanLabel
      JLabel declaring the Roman side
      (package private) java.lang.String romanString
      String that holds Roman Numerals
      (package private) java.lang.String[] RomanTypes
      String array for Roman combinations that are singular or subtract

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GUIFrame()
      Constructor that forms the GUI and performs real-time conversions based on keys being pressed on either side, and then displays the conversion on the other JTextField of the GUI
